name: flamingo-sc-monorepo
description: The monorepo for all the smart contracts for Flamingo Finance on Neo N3.

scripts.format:all: npm run format:prettier && npm run format:contracts
scripts.localnet:start: npm run localnet:reset && dotnet neoxp run --input=./localnet.neo-express --seconds-per-block=1
scripts.localnet:policy: dotnet neoxp policy set ExecutionFeeFactor 1 genesis --input=./localnet.neo-express && dotnet neoxp policy set StorageFeeFactor 1000 genesis --input=./localnet.neo-express && dotnet neoxp policy set NetworkFeePerByte 20 genesis --input=./localnet.neo-express
scripts.localnet:transfer: dotnet neoxp transfer 1000 gas genesis SuperAdmin --input=./localnet.neo-express && dotnet neoxp transfer 1000 gas genesis Alice --input=./localnet.neo-express && dotnet neoxp transfer 1000 gas genesis Bob --input=./localnet.neo-express
scripts.localnet:init: npm run localnet:policy && npm run localnet:transfer && node ./localnet.neo-express.js
